languages.text: "Час от часу не легче... Я рассчитывал на обычный скучный прием у губернатора, а не очередную резню!"
"It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"
languages.original_text: "Час от часу не легче... Я рассчитывал на обычный скучный прием у губернатора, а не очередную резню!"

traits.locale_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “情况真是越来越糟糕了……我本以为会和总督一起参加沉闷的接待会，而不是更多的屠杀！”
languages.original_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"

traits.locale_text: “情况真是越来越糟糕了……我本以为会和总督一起参加沉闷的接待会，而不是更多的屠杀！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Esto va de mal en peor... ¡Esperaba la típica recepción aburrida, no más muerte!».
languages.original_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"

traits.locale_text: «Esto va de mal en peor... ¡Esperaba la típica recepción aburrida, no más muerte!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「事態は悪化しているな…総督との典型的なあくびのでるような歓待を想像していたが、まさかこれほどのことになるとは！」
languages.original_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"

traits.locale_text: 「事態は悪化しているな…総督との典型的なあくびのでるような歓待を想像していたが、まさかこれほどのことになるとは！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Es wird immer schlimmer ... Ich habe einen langweiligen Empfang mit dem Gouverneur erwartet, nicht noch mehr Blutvergießen."
languages.original_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"

traits.locale_text: "Es wird immer schlimmer ... Ich habe einen langweiligen Empfang mit dem Gouverneur erwartet, nicht noch mehr Blutvergießen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « C'est de pire en pire... Je m'attendais à une réception ennuyeuse avec le gouverneur, pas à un autre carnage ! »
languages.original_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est de pire en pire... Je m'attendais à une réception ennuyeuse avec le gouverneur, pas à un autre carnage ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Durum kötüden betere doğru gidiyor... Validen sıradan, sıkıcı bir tepki göstermesini beklerdim, daha fazla katliam değil!"
languages.original_text: "It's going from bad to worse... I expected a typical dull reception with the governor, not more carnage!"

traits.locale_text: "Durum kötüden betere doğru gidiyor... Validen sıradan, sıkıcı bir tepki göstermesini beklerdim, daha fazla katliam değil!"
